document_data.name: Heralds' and Runners' Union
document_data.mainbody: The '''Heralds' and Runners' Union''' was the guildhall for the messengers and heralds in the city of [[Daggerford]] in the [[Western Heartlands]] in the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite interactive atlas|3990 Daggerford}}
document_data.Location: The guildhall was located along [[Wall Street (Daggerford)|Wall Street]] in southwest Daggerford next to the barracks.
document_data.Description: The structure stood three stories tall. A platform was found on the roof which added to the height of the building. Birds coups were kept atop the platform and were used for messenger birds.
